attributes.action: I would call on the Government to continue to make BBC Iplayer a free service
attributes.additional_details:
I have included a link for the original BBC News article
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36942458

This service must be kept free, otherwise the BBC will not modernise as the article claims, it will simply loose viewers, that is something I do not want.
attributes.background: A recent BBC News Article has said that BBC Iplayer is now to become a paid service, this is ridiculous.  Considering this a catch up service and many such as On Demand 4 and Channel 5 are free to use and just need an account to be set up.  I would call on the Government to make this a free service.
